import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Header } from './Header'; import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup'; const validationSchemaFourthStep = yup.object({ firstNameFiled: yup .string() .required('First name is required'), lastNameField: yup .string() .required('Last name is required'), telField: yup .string() .required('Telephone is required'), emailField: yup .string() .required('Email is required'), addressDropOffField: yup .string() .required('Address is required'), cityDropOffField: yup .string() .required('City is required'), stateDropOffField: yup .string() .required('State is required'), addressPickUpField: yup .string() .required('Address is required'), cityPickUpField: yup .string() .required('City is required'), statePickUpField: yup .string() .required('State is required'), }); const validationSchemaFourthStepDropOff = yup.object({ firstNameFiled: yup .string() .required('First name is required'), lastNameField: yup .string() .required('Last name is required'), telField: yup .string() .required('Telephone is required'), emailField: yup .string() .required('Email is required'), firstNameFiledDifferentDrop: yup .string() .required('First name is required'), lastNameFieldDifferentDrop: yup .string() .required('Last name is required'), telFieldDifferentDrop: yup .string() .required('Telephone is required'), emailFieldDifferentDrop: yup .string() .required('Email is required'), addressDropOffField: yup .string() .required('Address is required'), cityDropOffField: yup .string() .required('City is required'), stateDropOffField: yup .string() .required('State is required'), addressPickUpField: yup .string() .required('Address is required'), cityPickUpField: yup .string() .required('City is required'), statePickUpField: yup .string() .required('State is required'), }); const validationSchemaFourthStepPickUp = yup.object({ firstNameFiled: yup .string() .required('First name is required'), lastNameField: yup .string() .required('Last name is required'), telField: yup .string() .required('Telephone is required'), emailField: yup .string() .required('Email is required'), firstNameFiledDifferentPickUp: yup .string() .required('First name is required'), lastNameFiledDifferentPickUp: yup .string() .required('Last name is required'), telFiledDifferentPickUp: yup .string() .required('Telephone is required'), emailFiledDifferentPickUp: yup .string() .required('Email is required'), addressDropOffField: yup .string() .required('Address is required'), cityDropOffField: yup .string() .required('City is required'), stateDropOffField: yup .string() .required('State is required'), addressPickUpField: yup .string() .required('Address is required'), cityPickUpField: yup .string() .required('City is required'), statePickUpField: yup .string() .required('State is required'), }); const validateZipCode = value => { let stringValue = value + '' let error; if (!value) { error = 'Drop off required'; } else if (stringValue.length > 5) { error = 'postal code is 5 digits'; } else if (stringValue.length < 5) { error = 'postal code is 5 digits'; } return error; }; export const AddressFormStep = ({ formData, setFormData, nextStep, prevStep }) => { const [direction, setDirection] = useState('back'); const [validationSchemaActive, setValidationSchemaActive] = useState(validationSchemaFourthStep); const [openHideFieldsDropOff, setOpenHideFieldsDropOff] = useState(formData.sameAsMainContactDropOff); let sameContactAsDropOff = (openHideFieldsDropOff) ? 'disabledField' : '' const [openHideFieldsPickUp, setOpenHideFieldsPickUp] = useState(formData.sameAsMainContactPickUp); let sameContactAsPickUp = (openHideFieldsPickUp) ? 'disabledField' : '' useEffect(() => { // hide errors on checkboxes container let removeErr = document.getElementsByClassName('errorMessage'); let totalErr = 0; console.log('removeErr>>>', removeErr) if(sameContactAsDropOff === 'disabledField' && sameContactAsPickUp === 'disabledField'){ console.log('que verga') totalErr = removeErr.length removeErr[totalErr].blur() setValidationSchemaActive(validationSchemaFourthStep) }else if(sameContactAsDropOff === '' && sameContactAsPickUp === 'disabledField'){ console.log('que verga sameContactAsDropOff') setValidationSchemaActive(validationSchemaFourthStepDropOff) }else{ console.log('que verga sameContactAsPickUp') setValidationSchemaActive(validationSchemaFourthStepPickUp) } }, [sameContactAsDropOff, sameContactAsPickUp]); return ( <>

Your Details

Please fill out your contact information as Delivery and Pick-Up addresses

{ setFormData(values); direction === 'back' ? prevStep() : nextStep(); }} validationSchema={ validationSchemaActive } > {({ errors, touched }) => (

Main Contact Information

{errors.firstNameFiled && touched.firstNameFiled &&
{errors.firstNameFiled}
}
{errors.lastNameField && touched.lastNameField &&
{errors.lastNameField}
}
{errors.telField && touched.telField &&
{errors.telField}
}
{errors.emailField && touched.emailField &&
{errors.emailField}
}
{/* Drop-off Address */}

Drop-off Address

{errors.addressDropOffField && touched.addressDropOffField &&
{errors.addressDropOffField}
}
{errors.cityDropOffField && touched.cityDropOffField &&
{errors.cityDropOffField}
}
{errors.stateDropOffField && touched.stateDropOffField &&
{errors.stateDropOffField}
}
{errors.zipCodeDropOff && touched.zipCodeDropOff &&
{errors.zipCodeDropOff}
}
{errors.textareaDropOff && touched.textareaDropOff &&
{errors.textareaDropOff}
}

Drop-off Contact

{/* */} { setOpenHideFieldsDropOff(!openHideFieldsDropOff) } } />
{errors.firstNameFiledDifferentDrop && touched.firstNameFiledDifferentDrop &&
{errors.firstNameFiledDifferentDrop}
}
{errors.lastNameFieldDifferentDrop && touched.lastNameFieldDifferentDrop &&
{errors.lastNameFieldDifferentDrop}
}
{errors.telFieldDifferentDrop && touched.telFieldDifferentDrop &&
{errors.telFieldDifferentDrop}
}
{errors.emailFieldDifferentDrop && touched.emailFieldDifferentDrop &&
{errors.emailFieldDifferentDrop}
}
{/* Pick-up Address */}

Pick-up Address

{errors.addressPickUpField && touched.addressPickUpField &&
{errors.addressPickUpField}
}
{errors.cityPickUpField && touched.cityPickUpField &&
{errors.cityPickUpField}
}
{errors.statePickUpField && touched.statePickUpField &&
{errors.statePickUpField}
}
{errors.zipCodePickUp && touched.zipCodePickUp &&
{errors.zipCodePickUp}
}
{errors.textareaDropOff && touched.textareaDropOff &&
{errors.textareaDropOff}
}

Pick-up Contact

{ setOpenHideFieldsPickUp(!openHideFieldsPickUp) } } />
{errors.firstNameFiledDifferentPickUp && touched.firstNameFiledDifferentPickUp &&
{errors.firstNameFiledDifferentPickUp}
}
{errors.lastNameFiledDifferentPickUp && touched.lastNameFiledDifferentPickUp &&
{errors.lastNameFiledDifferentPickUp}
}
{errors.telFiledDifferentPickUp && touched.telFiledDifferentPickUp &&
{errors.telFiledDifferentPickUp}
}
{errors.emailFiledDifferentPickUp && touched.emailFiledDifferentPickUp &&
{errors.emailFiledDifferentPickUp}
}
)} ); };
